Class CartoonFigure

java.lang.Object
  CartoonFigure

public class CartoonFigure
extends java.lang.Object

A CartoonFigure object is a cartoon figure, displayed on the screen that can boil water, toast some bread, reheat food in the microwave, bake at medium temperature, watch TV, use a desktop computer, wash a load of clothes or others, vacuum, get their power bill, pay their power bill, go but only if they have paid their power bill

washLoad

public void washLoad(boolean frontType,
                     java.lang.String temperatureSetting)
Makes the CartoonFigure wash a load of clothes or others

Parameters:
frontType - true if the washing machine is a front loader, false otherwise
temperatureSetting - the setting for the temperature (can be "cold", "warm", or "hot")

watchTV

                    int size)
Makes the CartoonFigure watch TV

Parameters:
time - the time in minutes the TV is on
size - the screen size in inches (above 20)
